name: radioactivity_concentration_of_82Br_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Br" means the element "bromine" and "82Br" is the isotope "bromine-82" with a half-life of 1.47e+00 days.
